trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Pasadena
There were no other sightings in Pasadena on or around October 16th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was 4am and I went outside on my deck with my dogs as I had gotten up at this time because my husband was leaving on a business trip I noticed a flying object in the sky moving west. Not in the "normal" directions that planes fly over our house. At first I thought thats a plane, but why is it flying that way? I turned around walked about 5 paces and continued looking up at the sky at the Orion constellation; about 20 seconds passed I walked back to my original place, looked up and the object was in the same place. The object had white, yellow, red and blue lights, not all flashing at the same time, however the white one was consistent. It stayed in the same location for about 2 minutes before very slowly moving west. I was mesmorized, frightened and curious. I couldn't stop watching it wondering why I could not hear sound and why it wasn't moving. The white light got brighter at times; it made me feel as though it knew I was there. It took about 10 minutes for the object to move out of site; which was not very far. There is no reason it should have taken that long to travel the distance it did. I could not tell where it went as the house next door blocked the view.
Summary: hovering craft with blinking lights that tired to look like a plane
